name: Wacky Spooky Multiplayer Fun Time Respiratory Game
name_original: Wacky Spooky Multiplayer Fun Time Respiratory Game
description:
A multi-player game made over a weekend for Krassjam3! Play against your friends!

Theme: A game where you gamify your soul while holding your breath.

Hosting a server: UPnP forwarding is enabled so some routers will work out of the box, just give your friends your IP address. You can get it here: https://www.ipchicken.com If your friends can't connect you will need to manually port forward sorry!

If the game doesn't work you may need a newer version of Mono or .NET Framework depending on your platform, see below.

REQUIREMENTS:
Linux/Mac:
    Mono: A newer version of mono is required.
    Check your distribution's package manager.
    You need to run the executable with mono directly or in the terminal "mono Game.Desktop.exe"

    *Mac users, this hasn't been tested, I don't own a Mac sorry, but it should work.

Windows:
    .NET Framework https://www.microsoft.com/en-au/download/details.aspx?id=53344
